title: Philly Cheesesteak
tagline: Thinly sliced beef, gooey cheese, soft roll
steps: Freeze ribeye 30-60 minutes until firm. Slice as thin as possible against grain.
Cook onions in 1 tbsp oil until caramelized, 10-15 minutes. Season, transfer out.
Increase heat to high. Add remaining oil.
Spread steak thin, season. Sear 30 seconds, chop and stir. Cook until just done.
Pile into 4 portions. Top with cheese. Cover to melt.
